global number of non BC sides

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to an element

briefdescription.para: Create side info: normal vector, side length, and ghost cells.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to a side

briefdescription.para: Compute the cell specific values: barycenter, area, projection length of an element.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to an element

briefdescription.para: Compare two elements of the sideList list, used for sorting the list.

detaileddescription.para: Sort sideList array in order to retrieve the connectivity info more efficiently. Basically we want to sort the sides on three different levels: first, by their first node ID, secondly, by their second node ID, and thirdly by if they are a boundary condition side. The result might look something like this: 3 3 1 1 2 0 2 1 1 1 3 0 1 2 0 --> 2 1 1 3 1 0 2 2 1 2 2 1 3 3 0 3 3 0 3 3 1

parameterdescription.para: Pointer an element of the side list
Pointer an element of the side list

simplesect.para: The difference of a and b, if the values are the same, the move to next sorting metric

*nBCedges Pointer to the number of total BC edges
***quad Pointer to a 2D array, used for the quadrangles
